data.title: Educational Videos for Teaching & Learning
data.meta_description: ClickView makes it easy to find classroom-safe, relevant videos to deliver engaging lessons. Used by 6,000 schools. Sign up for free and try in your classroom today.
data.text:
Tailored onboarding

We know each school is different so we collaborate with you to ensure a successful ClickView rollout from day one. From integrating with your existing systems to setting up your content preferences, we tailor ClickView to you.

24/7 Support

You can't stop the unexpected from happening, so our team is available 24/7 to help overcome any challenges the school day throws at you.

“ClickView adds a layer of security to our teaching and learning materials through their safe selection of resources. As a CEO of twelve schools this gives me peace of mind. The video learning platform is easily accessible to all staff thus reducing teacher workload and ensuring consistency.

The interactive quiz layers provide an instant form of assessment; all our pupils benefit at home and at school; thus, supporting retrieval practice and overseeing progress. We are utilising this tool to support collaboration through our Trust and teacher development too. ClickView just works for our family of schools.“
